question: Which among the following is NOT among the Panchabhutas as per ancient Indian philosophy?
explanation: There are nine substances viz. prithvi? (earth), ap (water), tejas (fire), vayu (air), akasha (ether), kala (time), dik (space), atman (self) and manas (mind). The first five are called bhutas (Panchabhutas) the substances having some specific qualities so that they could be perceived by one or the other external senses.
